transactionSet.name: Application Advice
transactionSet.description: This Draft Standard for Trial Use contains the format and establishes the data contents of the Application Advice Transaction Set (824) for use within the context of an Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) environment. The transaction set can be used to provide the ability to report the results of an application system's data content edits of transaction sets. The results of editing transaction sets can be reported at the functional group and transaction set level, in either coded or free-form format. It is designed to accommodate the business need of reporting the acceptance, rejection or acceptance with change of any transaction set. The Application Advice should not be used in place of a transaction set designed as a specific response to another transaction set (e.g., purchase order acknowledgment sent in response to a purchase order).

segment.name: Transaction Set Header
segment.description: To indicate the start of a transaction set and to assign a control number

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

segment.name: Beginning Segment
segment.description: To indicate the beginning of a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Time Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Transaction Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of transaction

dataElement.name: Action Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating type of action

dataElement.name: Security Level Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

segment.name: Name
segment.description: To identify a party by type of organization, name, and code

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Identification Code Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

dataElement.name: Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a party or other code

dataElement.name: Entity Relationship Code
dataElement.description: Code describing entity relationship

dataElement.name: Entity Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

segment.name: Additional Name Information
segment.description: To specify additional names or those longer than 35 characters in length

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

segment.name: Address Information
segment.description: To specify the location of the named party

dataElement.description: Address information

dataElement.name: Address Information

segment.description: To specify the geographic place of the named party

dataElement.name: City Name
dataElement.description: Free-form text for city name

dataElement.name: State or Province Code
dataElement.description: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

dataElement.name: Postal Code
dataElement.description: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)

dataElement.name: Country Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the country

dataElement.name: Location Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying type of location

dataElement.name: Location Identifier
dataElement.description: Code which identifies a specific location

dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Contact Function Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the major duty or responsibility of the person or group named

dataElement.name: Name
dataElement.description: Free-form name

dataElement.name: Communication Number Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of communication number

dataElement.name: Communication Number
dataElement.description: Complete communications number including country or area code when applicable

dataElement.description: Code identifying the type of communication number

segment.name: Original Transaction Identification
segment.description: To identify the edited transaction set and the level at which the results of the edit are reported, and to indicate the accepted, rejected, or accepted-with-change edit result

dataElement.name: Application Acknowledgment Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the application system edit results of the business data

dataElement.name: Reference Identification Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

dataElement.name: Reference Identification
dataElement.description: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

dataElement.name: Application Sender's Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying party sending transmission; codes agreed to by trading partners

dataElement.name: Application Receiver's Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying party receiving transmission; codes agreed to by trading partners

dataElement.name: Date
dataElement.description: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD

dataElement.name: Time
dataElement.description: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)

dataElement.name: Group Control Number
dataElement.description: Assigned number originated and maintained by the sender

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

dataElement.name: Version / Release / Industry Identifier Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the version, release, subrelease, and industry identifier of the EDI standard being used, including the GS and GE segments; if code in DE455 in GS segment is X, then in DE 480 positions 1-3 are the version number; positions 4-6 are the release and subrelease, level of the version; and positions 7-12 are the industry or trade association identifiers (optionally assigned by user); if code in DE455 in GS segment is T, then other formats are allowed

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Purpose Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

dataElement.name: Transaction Type Code
dataElement.description: Code specifying the type of transaction

dataElement.name: Application Type
dataElement.description: Code identifying an application

dataElement.name: Action Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating type of action

dataElement.name: Transaction Handling Code
dataElement.description: Code designating the action to be taken by all parties

dataElement.name: Status Reason Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating the status reason

dataElement.name: Time Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the time. In accordance with International Standards Organization standard 8601, time can be specified by a + or - and an indication in hours in relation to Universal Time Coordinate (UTC) time; since + is a restricted character, + and - are substituted by P and M in the codes that follow

dataElement.description: Code indicating the date format, time format, or date and time format

dataElement.name: Date Time Period
dataElement.description: Expression of a date, a time, or range of dates, times or dates and times

dataElement.description: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value

segment.name: Individual or Organizational Name
segment.description: To supply the full name of an individual or organizational entity

dataElement.description: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

dataElement.name: Entity Type Qualifier
dataElement.description: Code qualifying the type of entity

dataElement.description: Individual last name or organizational name

dataElement.description: Individual first name

dataElement.description: Individual middle name or initial

dataElement.description: Prefix to individual name

segment.name: Technical Error Description
segment.description: To identify the error and, if feasible, the erroneous segment, or data element, or both

dataElement.name: Application Error Condition Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating application error condition

dataElement.name: Free Form Message
dataElement.description: Free-form text

dataElement.name: Segment ID Code
dataElement.description: Code defining the segment ID of the data segment in error (See Appendix A - Number 77)

dataElement.name: Segment Position in Transaction Set
dataElement.description: The numerical count position of this data segment from the start of the transaction set: the transaction set header is count position 1

dataElement.name: Element Position in Segment
dataElement.description: This is used to indicate the relative position of a simple data element, or the relative position of a composite data structure with the relative position of the component within the composite data structure, in error; in the data segment the count starts with 1 for the simple data element or composite data structure immediately following the segment ID

dataElement.name: Data Element Reference Number
dataElement.description: Reference number used to locate the data element in the Data Element Dictionary

dataElement.name: Copy of Bad Data Element
dataElement.description: This is a copy of the data element in error

dataElement.name: Data Element New Content
dataElement.description: New data which has replaced erroneous data

segment.name: Note/Special Instruction
segment.description: To transmit information in a free-form format, if necessary, for comment or special instruction

dataElement.name: Note Reference Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the functional area or purpose for which the note applies

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

segment.name: Related Data
segment.description: To provide business data related to an item within a transaction to which a business application editing process has been applied, and an error condition has resulted

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Related Data Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the nature of data related to an application edit error condition

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Source Subqualifier
dataElement.description: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

dataElement.name: Code List Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Industry Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

segment.name: Code Source Information
segment.description: To transmit standard code list identification information

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Source Subqualifier
dataElement.description: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

segment.name: Industry Code
segment.description: Code to transmit standard industry codes

dataElement.name: Code List Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Industry Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

segment.name: Related Data
segment.description: To provide business data related to an item within a transaction to which a business application editing process has been applied, and an error condition has resulted

dataElement.name: Description
dataElement.description: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

dataElement.name: Related Data Identification Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the nature of data related to an application edit error condition

dataElement.name: Agency Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

dataElement.name: Source Subqualifier
dataElement.description: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

dataElement.name: Code List Qualifier Code
dataElement.description: Code identifying a specific industry code list

dataElement.name: Industry Code
dataElement.description: Code indicating a code from a specific industry code list

segment.name: Transaction Set Trailer
segment.description: To indicate the end of the transaction set and provide the count of the transmitted segments (including the beginning (ST) and ending (SE) segments)

dataElement.name: Number of Included Segments
dataElement.description: Total number of segments included in a transaction set including ST and SE segments

dataElement.name: Transaction Set Control Number
dataElement.description: Identifying control number that must be unique within the transaction set functional group assigned by the originator for a transaction set
